items.sentence: Let's do as much as we can today and finish the rest tomorrow.
Tom tried to hide behind a big tree, but the others found him.
Tom was handcuffed and shoved into the back of the police car.
As I hovered over my dead body, I knew that I was now a ghost.
Do you have any idea where those pictures might've been taken?
What kind of music did you listen to when you were a teenager?
No matter how you look at it, the odds are stacked against us.
Tom claims that he's seen a UFO, but Mary doesn't believe him.
Those dolls weren't easy to sell, but I finally sold them all.
We don't have enough time to build another barn before winter.
